results.title: Association of simvastatin and hyperlipidemia with periodontal status and bone metabolism markers.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: Within the limits of this study, the findings suggest that the intake of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ is associated with increasing serum @GENE_TNFRSF11B @GENE_4982 @@@OPG@@@ concentrations, and this could have a protective effect against bone breakdown and periodontal @<m>DISEASE_Periodontal_Attachment_Loss</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017622 @@@attachment loss@@@.

citations.NLM: Magán-Fernández A, Papay-Ramírez L, Tomás J, Marfil-Álvarez R, Rizzo M, Bravo M, Mesa F. Association of simvastatin and hyperlipidemia with periodontal status and bone metabolism markers. J Periodontol. 2014 Oct;85(10):1408-15. PMID: 24555750
